titles.title: To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to ensure that certain educational benefits administered by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs are treated as income by landlords evaluating the ability of a servicemember, veteran, or a spouse or child of a servicemember or veteran, to pay rent.
Students LIVE Act of 2018
Students LIVE Act of 2018
Students Living Irrespective of Veterans Educational Assistance Act of 2018
Students Living Irrespective of Veterans Educational Assistance Act of 2018
Students LIVE Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
